StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetListSchedulingCardIdBySchoolPro.leID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolPro.leId uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SchoolId uniqueidentifier DECLARE @SchoolYear int
SELECT @SchoolId = hs.rowguid, @SchoolYear = School_Year FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON hsp.School_Code = hs.School_Code WHERE hsp.rowguid = @SchoolPro.leId
SELECT TOP 1 [ImportEventId] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ImportEvent] WHERE SchoolId = @SchoolId AND Gradua.onYear = @SchoolYear ORDER BY LastUpdateDate DESC
END
